title: Hypnotic Fascination - the power of the gaze / Non-verbal hypnosis
description:

The hypnotized people enter in a deep state of hypnotic induction, which leads to many other hypnotic trance states. Non-verbal hypnosis connects us to our deepest selves. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
